text:
Listing 24.20: Example output from evaluating a CNN with and without data standardization.
A box and whisker plot of the results is also created. This allows the two samples of results
to be compared in a nonparametric way, showing the median and the middle 50% of each
sample. We can see that the distribution of results with standardization is quite diﬀerent from
the distribution of results without standardization. This is likely a real eﬀect.
